original_text: They must not eat the fat of an animal that they have burnt as a gift on the Lord's altar. They must send away from God's people anyone who does eat it.
korean_text: 사람이 여호와께 화제로 드리는 제물의 기름을 먹으면 그 먹는 자는 자기 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: They must not eat the fat
of an animal that they have burnt
as a gift on the Lord's altar
They must send away from God's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 백성 중에서 쫓아내야 한다
